PERSONA:
meet james, a 35-year-old married man living in a non-metropolitan area of the east south central region in the south. he is a white non-hispanic who was born and raised in the united states. james is a college graduate with some post-graduate education under his belt.

james is a devout protestant christian who identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian. he attends religious services once a week, and his faith plays a significant role in his life. politically, james aligns himself with the republican party and considers himself a moderate.

despite his moderate political views, james comes from a lower-income bracket, earning between $30,000 and $40,000 annually. however, he is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously. james is an active member of his community, frequently volunteering his time and efforts.

in his personal life, james enjoys spending time with his family and staying connected through frequent internet use. he values education and personal growth, which is reflected in his educational achievements and ongoing pursuit of knowledge.

overall, james is a well-rounded individual who strikes a balance between his religious beliefs, political leanings, and community involvement while navigating the challenges of life in a non-metropolitan area with a modest income.
